mapper.select: SELECT u.id , u.user_nickname, comment_id, c.content, c.created_at,p.title, (SELECT uu.user_nickname FROM poem pp INNER JOIN user uu ON uu.id = pp.user_id where pp.id = p.id) as nickname FROM comment_like l INNER JOIN user u ON l.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN comment c ON c.id = l.comment_id INNER JOIN poem p ON p.id = c.poem_id WHERE l.user_id = #{userId} AND c.deleted = 0;
